item.title: Julie [Kaskade] add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "You've seen the sun flatten and take strange shapes just before it sinks in the ocean. Do you have to tell yourself every time that it's an illusion caused by atmospheric dust and light distorted by the sea, or do you simply enjoy the beauty of it?" -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Julie [Kaskade] add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "When I face the desolate impossibility of writing five hundred pages, a sick sense of failure falls on me, and I know I can never do it. Then gradually, I write one page and then another. One day's work is all I can permit myself to contemplate." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Julie [Kaskade] add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "I wonder how many people I've looked at all my life and never seen." -- John Steinbeck
